DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, randomized, double blind, parallel group study of 3 months' treatment with SLV308 administered as a monotherapy in patients with advance stage PD. An open label safety extension to this study is planned as a separate protocol for patients who are willing and eligible to participate.
DOC.brief_title: SLV308 for Treatment of Patients With Parkinson's Disease Experiencing Motor Fluctuations
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's Disease, advance stage of disease, Modified Hoehn & Yahr stage IIIV, presence of a recognizable 'on' and 'off' state (motor fluctuations) and stable treatment with levodopa for at least 28 days prior to randomization 'onoff' phenomena or 'yoyoing' and/or an abrupt unpredictable loss of efficacy unrelated to the timing of LDOPA administration, Prevalent expression of troublesome dyskinesias during 'on' time at waking hours, Diagnosis is unclear or a suspicion of other parkinsonian syndromes exists, Previous surgery for the treatment of PD
